@@ -6,6 +6,10 @@ LL | const TUP: (usize,) = 5usize << 64;
    |
    = note: expected tuple `(usize,)`
                found type `usize`
+help: use a trailing comma to create a tuple with one element
+   |

+   |                       ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

                found type `{integer}`
+help: use a trailing comma to create a tuple with one element
